Source:

Since:
  • 1.0.0
Add a ComparisonPredicate or CompoundPredicate
Parameters:
Name Type Attributes Default Description
option Object
options.type string what type of Predicate to add
options.how string
optional
 after should we insert it before, after or instead of? (currently only after is supported)
options.where dataclasses.Predicate current element
Returns:
inserted predicate
Type
Promise.<dataclasses.Predicate>

Remove a ComparisonPredicate or CompoundPredicate
Parameters:
Name Type Description
predicate dataclasses.ComparisonPredicate | dataclasses.CompoundPredicate
Returns:
yield the removed predicate, will reject the promise if remove was called with the root CompoundPredicate or the last ComparisonPredicate of the root CompoundPredicate
Type
Promise.<dataclasses.Predicate>
